room_title: Escape room "Poe's Chamber" by Escape Room Arlington in Arlington (VA)
room_address: 2301 Columbia Pike Suite C Arlington, VA 22204
room_description: Explore the dwelling of one of the greatest literary minds of all time. As fellow scholars you’ve been sent to Poe’s residence to collect his final works after his untimely death, but upon entering you are locked in by his arch-nemesis, Rufus Griswold. Griswold plans to besmirch the good name of Poe by spreading lies and deceit about his stories and personal life. Navigate the myriad of secrets and mysteries of Poe’s Chambers to escape and preserve the legacy of a genius.
